title: Set In Trade Status
description: Set whether the member is a professional trader. If they are a professional trader then their listings are protected by the Consumer Guarantees Act. See also  get in trade reasons API.
permission_required: MyTradeMeWrite: Maintain your watchlist, answer questions and post comments.

fields.name: ReasonId
fields.description: The reason for changing the in trade status. See 'ReasonId' in  get in trade reasons API.

fields.name: Comment
fields.description: An additional comment that is needed for specific reasons. See 'NeedsComment' in  get in trade reasons API.

fields.name: Success
fields.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: The description of the error, if the operation failed.
